welcome: Ben: Hey! I'm glad you called your friend Ben. Are you ready for some adventure?
rootWelcomeNew0: Ben: That sounds neat.  I love adventure! Lily: Do you mean going shopping with mom? Because that's always an adventure... Ben: No, Lily, I'm talking about a real adventure. Hey friend, what's the coolest place you've ever visited?
rootWelcomeNew1: Ben: Awesome! Well - if we go on an adventure, we'll explore ancient temples, sail the seven seas, and even visit a fantasy kingdom... together! Lily: That sounds so great! Can I come too? Pretty please! Ben: Sure, but be warned -- we'll face a lot of exciting dangers! Alexa, want to come along to track of our coins? Alexa: I'd love to join you.  Let me just put on my adventure hat. Ben: Great! Hey adventure buddy, what would you buy with all the gold in the world?
rootWelcomeNew2: Ben: Nice! Alexa, tell us about the available missions!
welcomeBackRoyalAchievements: I'm so happy to see you again, you mighty __ACHIEVEMENTS__.
welcomeBackRoyalLast: New adventures are waiting for you.
welcomeBack: Ben: Welcome back! Alexa, where did we leave off last time?
welcomeBackCheckpoint: Alexa: Would you like to continue with __MISSION_NAME__ or choose a new mission?
newMissionUnlocked: Alexa: Hey, you've unlocked a new mission, called __MISSION_NAME__! I bet it's lots of fun! If you want to go on the new mission, say YES. Or if you want to choose a different mission, say NO.
selectMission: The following missions are unlocked: __MISSIONS_AVAILABLE__. Which one would you like to do?
fallback: We cannot do that right now
actionDescription: Let's start our treasure quest. Say whee if you see snake, say woah if you see darts.
actionFail2: Ben: Oops! You got hurt, which means you only have two lives left! Don't worry, we've got this!
actionFail1: Ben: Uh oh! You got hurt again, which means you only have one life left. Better be careful!
coinNotPicked: Ben: Oops, you missed the coin! Don't worry, we'll find another!
sceneConfirm: Ben: We made it! Lucky us!
sceneFail: Ben: Aww, that was the third time you got hurt, which means we failed. It was a effort! Alexa: Do you want to try again?
sceneFailReprompt: Do you want to try again?
royalRansomIntro0: Ben: Alright, Adventurer! For this mission our goal is to help our friend King Max. He has his own castle and everything. Alexa Speechcon: wow! Alexa: Hey, Adventurer. Have you ever wished you were a king or queen?
royalRansomIntro1: Lily: Cool! I'd like to be a princess and ride my ponies all day! Ben: Unfortunately, a village near King Max's castle was destroyed by a dragon recently. While helping to rebuild, one of his princess daughters was kidnapped by bandits! Lily: Those meanies! I bet they'll only release her if King Alex pays them a lot of gold, right? Ben: Right! But since he already spent all his gold on the village, King Max is counting on us to help him collect all 60 COINS save his daughter. We'll need 5 COINS in each area we come across. Let's get started!
royalRansom1Intro0: Ben: Thanks to us, Princess Anna is still safe in the castle! We even got that neat Royal Cape too! Ben: But now they need our help again! This time it's Princess Anna's pet puppy! Bandits stole him while he was playing outside. Lily: They stole a puppy?! Those monsters! Alexa Speechcon: oh my! Alexa: Have you ever had any pets you really love, BRAVE RESCUER?
royalRansom1Intro1: Lily: Nice! I always kiss Mr. Button goodnight. He's my fuzzy hamster! Ben: King Max is still short on gold, and the bandits are raising their coin demands, so we'll have help gather 120 COINS to rescue Sir Bedivere. Lily: That's a funny name for a royal puppy! Don't worry Sir Bedivere, we're on our way! Ben: We'll need 10 COINS in each area to get him back. Let's go!
royalRansom2Intro0: Ben: Good job last time guys! We got Sir Bedivere back to the castle. Lily: The Royal Chew Toy he gave us as thanks is so cute! Ben: Now it's time for our biggest royal mission yet! King Max needs coins to hire an expert bandit hunters to put a stop to all the kidnapping! Alexa Speechcon: bravo!  Lily: Good idea! Let's help catch them before King Max himself gets caught! I've heard he sleepwalks in the castle gardens at night! Alexa: Do you know anyone who walks or talks in their sleep, FEARLESS HERO?
royalRansom2Intro1: Lily: Cool! My dad snores really loud. That's worse than sleep walking! Ben: We'll need more coins than ever before — 180 COINS — but it'll be worth it! Ben: We can make it if we get 15 COINS in each area. Follow me! Lily: Lead the way, big brother!
royalRansomOutro0: Ben: Hey, that was some adventure! We even collected enough coins to help Princes Anna! I already sent them to the castle. Alexa Speechcon: woo hoo! Lily: Oh yeah! We rule! Ben: Let's go meet King Max! He's already waiting for us. [footstep sounds?] King Max: Hello, everyone! Lily: Hiii! Alexa: Greetings, your Highness. Your turn to say hello, Adventurer!
royalRansomOutro1: King Max: Thank you all for your help! Oh look, the guards are arriving with Princess Anna already! Princess Anna: Hi everyone! Thank you all for rescuing me! Lily: I can't believe I'm meeting a real princess! King Max: For your bravery and courage, I am giving you all the nickname BRAVE RESCUER and rewarding you with a ROYAL CAPE! Lily: Ooh, it's so fancy looking! Ben: What a neat nickname! Bye everyone. We're off to our next adventure! Princess Anna: Take care, friends! And thank you again, BRAVE RESCUER!
royalRansom1Outro0: Ben: What an adventure! I already sent King Max the coins to save Sir Bedivere! Lily: Yeah, we did it! Alexa Speechcon: yippee! Ben: Let's go meet King Max! He's already waiting for us. [running sounds?] King Max: Greetings, everyone! Ah, hello again BRAVE RESCUER! Princess Anna: Look who's already here thanks to you! Sir Bedivere: Wooof! Lily: He's so cute! Alexa: Look, BRAVE RESCUER. Sir Bedivere wants you to rub his belly. Say 'good boy' to give him a good scratch.
royalRansom1Outro1: Sir Bedivere: Wooof! Princess Anna: For helping to rescue my beloved Bedivere, I dub thee FEARLESS HERO. Sir Bedivere also wants you to have this reward, a ROYAL CHEW TOY. Lily: Aww, thanks puppy! Ben: That nickname has a nice ring to it! Bye everyone. Come on, FEARLESS HERO, we're off to our next adventure! Princess Anna: Take care, friends!
royalRansom2Outro0: Ben: Hey, that was a fun adventure! It was tough but we got enough coins to catch the bandits! Lily: I knew we could do it! Alexa Speechcon: hurray! Ben: Let's go to the castle! [running sounds?] Princess Anna: Hello, friends! A special greetings to our FEARLESS HERO! Sir Bedivere: Wooof! King Max: Ah, my trusty friends! Thanks to you, those nasty bandits will have plenty of time in my dungeon to think about changing their ways! Ben: Great! King Max: For helping me, I give you my grandest nickname of all: CHAMPION OF THE KING. Ben: Wow! Alexa: Now that's a nickname. What do you think about it, CHAMPION OF THE KING?
royalRansom2Outro1: King Max: Because you have helped make our kingdom safe, I will also give you a ROYAL SWORD. May your future adventures be exciting and prosperous! Ben: A royal sword? So cool! Thanks, your highness, and take care! Princess Anna: Goodbye, friends! Sir Bedivere: Wooof!
ancientTempleIntro0: Ben: Woah! This temple looks so old! I bet the explorers who first discovered it were very surprised! Alexa Speechcon: eureka! Alexa: What do you like to shout when you discover something exciting, adventurer?
ancientTempleIntro1: Lily: Maybe! I just hope there aren't any big spiders... Lily: What if the first explorers are trapped inside... or worse! Ben: That won't happen to skilled adventurers like us! Let's go!
ancientTemple1Intro0: Ben: This temple is impressive! I wonder what civilization from the past built it! Alexa: Hey friend. What do you think the people who lived in here looked like?
ancientTemple1Intro1: Lily: Probably! All I know is that they probably didn't have internet. Poor things... Ben: Alright, let's enter the temple!
ancientTemple2Intro0: Ben: What a gigantic temple! I've never seen anything like it! Ben: How long do you think it took to build, adventurer buddy?
ancientTemple2Intro1: Lily: Probably! When I grow up I'm living in a palace just as big! Ben: Let's head inside!
templeHallsIntro0: Ben: Okay, there should be coins all over this old temple. You're not afraid of snakes, right?
templeHallsIntro1: Lily: Are you sure it's safe in here, big bro? Ben: Don't worry, just follow my lead!
templeHalls1Intro0: Ben: Don't worry, guys. This temple is tricky but I know where I'm going.. I think. You trust me, right?
templeHalls1Intro1: Lily: Well, you haven't let us down before, big brother! Let's go!
templeHalls2Intro0: Ben: Alright guys, let's get through this temple! What do you think we'll find?
templeHalls2Intro1: Lily: Dibs on any shiny gems! Oh, and fancy jewelry!
demoPrompt: I am ready. How about you, __USERNAME__? If not, say 'Lily first' to see how it's done! Or if you're ready, say 'I'm ready!'
readyPrompt: Ready to go, __USERNAME__? If not, say 'Help' to see how it's done! Or, if you're ready, say 'I'm ready!'
templeHallsDemo: Ben: Okay! Watch and learn. [they start running] Ben: [sound of blow darts whizzing ]... Darts! [alexa_answer_sound] Alexa Speechcon: yikes! Ben: [sound of the snakes]... Snake! [alexa_answer_sound] Alexa Speechcon: whee! Ben: [sound of coins]... Coins! [alexa_answer_sound] Alexa Speechcon: aha! Alexa: Alright, Adventurer, it's your turn to follow Ben! Ready?
templeHallsOutro0: Ben: Great work, everyone! We made it to the next area of the temple!
templeHalls1Outro0: Ben: That was a good start! We'll be out of this temple in no time!
templeHalls2Outro0: Ben: Great job so far but this temple is only going to get trickier up ahead!
exclamation2: Ben: You're doing good so far!
exclamation4: Ben: Great job but we're not done yet!
exclamation5: Ben: It'll take more than that to stop us!
exclamation7: Lily: That was a close one!
exclamation9: Lily: We make a great team!
exclamation10: Lily: Woohoo! I'm glad I came!
cryptRoomIntro0: Ben: We're in the crypt room! Creepy, huh? Hey, what's this old inscription say? Lily: Those who of our coins take will soon regret their big mistake... Ben: Do you believe in ancient curses, my friend?
cryptRoomIntro1: Ben: I just hope the part about the coins being here is true.
cryptRoom1Intro0: Ben: Nice! We made it to the crypt room! It's dustier than I thought in h-... Ah-ah-Achoo!
cryptRoom1Intro1: Lily: Let's keep going before Ben sneezes all over us!
cryptRoom2Intro0: Ben: We made it to the crypt room, the heart of the temple! Who do you think was buried in a big, old temple like this?
cryptRoom2Intro1: Lily: I just hope they left a bunch of coins behind! Let's do this!
cryptRoomOutro0: Ben: We're closer to the end of the temple now! Let's keep up the pace!
cryptRoom1Outro0: Ben: That crypt room was serious business! Let's get out of here!
cryptRoom2Outro0: Ben: Nice! We're one step closer to leaving here with a bunch of coins!
templeEscapeIntro0: Ben: Great work, everyone! We're close to the exit! Lily: After all this I can't wait to get home and take a nice bubble bath. How do you guys like to relax?
templeEscapeIntro1: Ben: Don't relax yet! We still gotta get out of here!
templeEscape1Intro0: Ominous Voice: Those who of our coins take will soon regret their big mistake! Ben: Umm, did anyone else hear that?
templeEscape1Intro1: Lily: I'm too young to die in a cursed temple! Let's get out of here!
templeEscape2Intro0: Ben: We're so close to the exit! Uh oh, I think the gate is closing though! Think we'll make it?
templeEscape2Intro1: Lily: I don't know about you guys but I'm sure not staying here! Run!!!
templeEscapeOutro0: Ben: That was awesome! Hey, I think we're nearing the end of the temple!
templeEscape1Outro0: Ben: Nice job, but we're not out of this crazy temple yet!
templeEscape2Outro0: Ben: I think I smell fresh air! We're almost out of the temple!
ancientTempleFinaleIntro0: Ben: We're close, but we have to go faster! I'll going to stop calling out what is up ahead, so listen closely and respond correctly!
ancientTempleFinale1Intro0: Ben: I'm going to run ahead and make sure the gate is open! That means you'll have to avoid obstacles by sound alone. Good luck!
ancientTempleFinale2Intro0: Ben: There are too many obstacles up ahead for me to shout out! From now on you'll have to listen for them yourself. You can do it!
royalRansomAncientTempleOutro0: Ben: I see a way out! Good thing we already collected 20 coins. Let's get through the closing gate to reach Pirate Bay. Ben: It's almost shut! Let's slide under just in time by shouting 'woohoo!' Ready…. Now!

royalRansomAncientTempleOutro1Yes: Ben: Awesome! You slid under perfectly. Lily: Don't worry, Princess Anna! We're on our way!
royalRansomAncientTemple1Outro0: Ben: Cool, we've got 40 coins! Just one more hallway and we're out of the tem-- Ben: Oh no! The entire floor is collapsing! It's going to take a super leap to reach the end. Let's do it by shouting 'woohoo!' Ready…. Now!

royalRansomAncientTemple2Outro0: Ben: 60 coins already? We rock! Next stop, Pirate Bay! Ben: Uh oh! It looks like someone, or something, sealed the gate shut already! Try breaking through with a mighty punch by shouting 'Hiyaaa!' Ready…. Now!

pirateBayIntro0: Ben: Time to get across Pirate Bay! What better way than with our own ship? Alexa: Got any good ship name ideas for our ship name, sailor?
pirateBayIntro1: Ben: I like it! You'll be the captain while I'll be your lookout, which means I'll let you know if we're approaching something dangerous. Lily: What about me? Ben: You can swab the poop deck, hahaha! Lily: No way!
pirateBay1Intro0: Ben: Here we are in Pirate Bay! And guess what, you'll be the captain of our ship! Alexa: What cool captain name are you giving yourself?
pirateBay1Intro1: Lily: That's a good one! When I'm captain I'll be Captain Cheesecake! Why? 'Cause I love it, duh! Ben: Alright, captain! It'll be up to you to steer the ship and keep us on course! Lily: I can't wait to set sail!
pirateBay2Intro0: Ben: Fresh salty air. Warm sandy beach. We're in Pirate Bay, all right! Lily: Ooh, do we have time to play on the beach for a while first? Alexa: What's your favorite thing to do at the beach, sailor?
pirateBay2Intro1: Lily: Sounds fun! Ben: There'll be time to play later! Captain Seadog is counting on us! Let's set sail!

outToSea2Outro0: Ben: Fine sailing, captain! We'll be on dry land before we know it!

perilousWatersIntro1: Ben: I think they'll be the least of our worries up ahead!

shipwreckBay2Outro0: Ben: Land ho! We're closing in on our journey's end, everyone!

theVillage1Outro0: Ben: That thief doesn't know when to give up, does he? Let's get him!
theVillage2Outro0: Ben: Good job! The thief is now headed toward the castle!
castleGroundsIntro0: Ben: Oh man! Now he's running toward the castle! Lily:  I hope we see the royal gardens! Do any of you have a favorite flower?
castleGroundsIntro1: Ben: I think the king likes roses so we'll need to be careful!
castleGrounds1Intro0: Ben: Wow, he's fast! Even the castle guards can't keep up! Lily: That thief is pretty in shape! What do you guys do for exercise?
castleGrounds1Intro1: Ben: He's just lucky I don't have my bike. Let's go!
castleGrounds2Intro0: Ben: The thief is taking us to the castle grounds! I bet he'd love to steal some stuff from inside! Lily: What valuable things do you think they keep inside the castle?
castleGrounds2Intro1: Ben: Whatever is inside, he's not getting it! Let's catch him!
castleGroundsOutro0: Ben: The thief is running into dragon valley! After him!
castleGrounds1Outro0: Ben: Even the rose bushes didn't slow him down! Let's keep chasing!
castleGrounds2Outro0: Ben: Nice job keeping up with the thief! We'll catch him soon!
dragonValleyIntro0: Ben: Yikes! All our commotion has attracted a dragon. Lily:  Uh oh! Maybe we can feed it something so it doesn't eat us! Do you know what food dragons like?
dragonValleyIntro1: Ben: Right now we're on the menu!
dragonValley1Intro0: Ben: This thief is crazy! He's running straight into Dragon Valley! Lily: Cool! What mythical creature do you wish really existed?
dragonValley1Intro1: Lily: I'd want a beautiful unicorn!
dragonValley2Intro0: Ben: The thief thinks he can hide from us in Dragon Valley! Lily: We all have our favorite hiding place, right? Do you have one?
dragonValley2Intro1: Ben: No matter where he hides, we'll find him!
dragonValleyOutro0: Lily: I'm sure glad we didn't end up in that dragon's stomach back there!
dragonValley1Outro0: Ben: Yesss! We got through dragon valley and the thief is getting tired!
dragonValley2Outro0: Ben: That was impressive! Now let's nab that thief and end this!
kingdomChaseFinaleIntro0: Ben: The thief is picking up speed! Instead of me saying what's ahead, just listen closely for what the thief runs into. Let's go!
kingdomChaseFinale1Intro0: Ben: Uh oh, I'm getting tired! You take the lead and listen closely for upcoming obstacles. You've got this!
kingdomChaseFinale2Intro0: Ben: We have to run faster to finally catch the thief! From now on, just listen to the obstacles so you can avoid them. Let's go!
pirateBusinessKingdomChaseOutro0: Ben: The thief just ran up a tree! He's not getting away that easy! Ben: Let's knock him out of it together by hitting the tree. Just shout 'pow!' on my signal. Ready…. Now!
pirateBusinessKingdomChaseOutro1No: Ben: Uh oh, you didn't say it right. I'm sure he'll fall out by himself eventually. Lily: I'm so glad we already have 20 coins for Captain Seadog's hat! Let's find more at the temple!
pirateBusinessKingdomChaseOutro1Yes: Ben: That looked like it hurt! The thief will be seeing stars for a while after that! Lily: I'm so glad we already have 20 coins for Captain Seadog's hat! Let's find more at the temple!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase1Outro0: Ben: The thief's trying to get away by riding a wild horse! Ben: Maybe we can scare it so it kicks the thief off. Let's shout 'rawr' in three, two one... now!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase1Outro1No: Ben: Darn, the thief got away! At least we collected a lot of coins from him though. Lily: We're off to a good start with the coins we need for Captain Seadog's crew. We already have 40! Let's find more at the temple!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase1Outro1Yes: Ben: It worked! Ouch, that wasn't a pretty landing. More coins for us! Lily: We're off to a good start with the coins we need for Captain Seadog's crew. We already have 40! Let's find more at the temple!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase2Outro0: Ben: The thief has gone crazy! He's hiding inside a sleeping dragon's mouth! Ben: I've got an idea! Let's wake up the dragon with a loud 'Boo!' Ready... now!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase2Outro1No: Ben: Oh well. Maybe the dragon will spit him out sooner or later. Lily: Luckily we got 60 coins from the thief for Captain Seadog's ship! Let's collect more at the ancient temple!
pirateBusinessKingdomChase2Outro1Yes: Ben: It worked! The dragon spit him right out. Eww, that's a lot of spit... Lily: Luckily we got 60 coins from the thief for Captain Seadog's ship! Let's collect more at the ancient temple!
tikiTroubleKingdomChaseOutro0: Ben: The thief's last resort is hiding up a stone tower! Ben: Let's knock him out of it together by tumbling it down with a super kick. Just shout 'Bam!' on my signal. Ready…. Now!
tikiTroubleKingdomChaseOutro1No: Ben: Uh oh, you didn't say it right. I'm sure he'll fall out by himself eventually. Lily: Yay, we got lots of coins for Tiki Ten's bamboo xylophone! Only 20 more coins to go!
tikiTroubleKingdomChaseOutro1Yes: Ben: That looked like it hurt! The thief will definitely feel that in the morning! Lily: Yay, we got lots of coins for Tiki Ten's bamboo xylophone! Only 20 more coins to go!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase1Outro0: Ben: Woah, look at the size of that beehive the thief just pulled out! Ben: He's gonna throw it at us! Let's bat it back his way with a stick by shouting 'thwack!' Ready... now!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase1Outro1No: Ben: Ouch! Those bee stings didn't feel good, but we'll live. Lily: We're off to a good start with the coins we need for Captain Seadog's crew. Let's find the last 40 coins we need at the temple!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase1Outro1Yes: Ben: Hah! Look at him run while getting stung by all those bees! Serves him right! Lily: We're off to a good start with the coins we need for Captain Seadog's crew. Let's find the last 40 coins we need at the temple!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase2Outro0: Ben: The thief has gone crazy! He's hiding inside a sleeping dragon's mouth! Ben: I've got an idea! Let's wake up the dragon with a loud 'Boo!' Ready... now!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase2Outro1No: Ben: Oh well. Maybe the dragon will spit him out sooner or later. Lily: Let's head over to ancient temple and get the last 60 coins we need for Tiki Mezzo's ukulele!
tikiTroubleKingdomChase2Outro1Yes: Ben: It worked! The dragon spit him right out. Eww, that's a lot of spit... Lily: Let's head over to ancient temple and get the last 60 coins we need for Tiki Mezzo's ukulele!
pirateBusinessIntro0: Ben: Time to set sail on our first swashbuckling journey. For now we'll even call ourselves sailors! Alexa Speechcon: argh! Alexa: Hey sailor, have you ever imagined that you were a pirate?
pirateBusinessIntro1: Lily: Arr! If I were a pirate I'd have a nice feathery captain's hat! Ben: Our first mission is to help my matey Captain Seadog. He's a good pirate like us. But sadly, evil pirates recently left him stranded on an island. Lily: Poor guy! He must be pretty sad. How can we help him? Ben: We can inspire him by helping him get back out to sea! First we'll need to collect 60 COINS to get him a new captain hat! Should be no problem if we get 5 COINS in each area. Let's get started!
pirateBusiness1Intro0: Ben: Great job last time, crew! Captain Seadog looks very happy with his new hat! And hey, we got an awesome Pirate Flag as a reward! Lily: That hat was pretty valuable! I hope he doesn't bury it or something... Alexa Speechcon: ahoy! Lily: Alexa: Hey, SEA VOYAGER. Where would you bury your pirate treasure?
pirateBusiness1Intro1: Lily: Good idea! Don't forget to make a map so you remember how to find it later! Ben: This time our goal is to gather enough coins to help Captain Seadog hire back his old crew. They're more expensive than a pirate hat, so this time we'll need 120 COINS. Lily: Arr, it'll be like a pirate family reunion! Ben: We only need 10 COINS from each area. Let's go!
pirateBusiness2Intro0: Ben: Good job during our last pirate mission, mateys! We got Captain Seadog's beloved crew back and got a cool Pirate Parrot as a reward! Parrot: Caw! Ben: However, Seadog and his men can't journey out to sea without a ship. Alexa Speechcon: bon voyage! Alexa: Hey, SHIPMASTER. Where in the world would you sail with your own ship?
pirateBusiness2Intro1: Ben: Cool! I'd try to find undiscovered islands! Lily: What happened to his old ship? Is it gone? Ben: It's not gone, sis, but badly damaged. If fact, we'll need a whopping 180 COINS to repair his precious ship. But we can do it! All we need is to get 15 COINS in each area. Follow me!
pirateBusinessOutro0: Ben: A grand adventure, if I do say so myself! Let's go find Captain Seadog! Captain Seadog: Ahoy, Ben and friends! Alexa Speechcon: ahoy! Lily: Ahoy! Alexa: Your turn to say hello, sailor!
pirateBusinessOutro1: Ben: Captain, we need you to get back out to sea! To help, we've collected coins to buy you a new hat! Captain Seadog: Arrr, is that so? Mighty kind o' ya! It just so happens I have a pirate hat catalog with me right now! Lily: Cool, can I take a look?! Captain Seadog: I know it ain't much but for your help, I bestow upon thee the nickname SEA VOYAGER. Ye can also have this gift, a PIRATE FLAG. Lily: Ooh, that's a cool flag! Ben: Great nickname too! Well, off to our next adventure! Come on, guys! You too, SEA VOYAGER!
pirateBusiness1Outro0: Ben: That adventure had plenty of thrills! And hey, we have enough coins to rehire Captain Seadog's crew! Let's go! Captain Seadog: Ahoy, SEA VOYAGER and mateys! How are ye? Alexa Speechcon: ahoy! Ben: Ahoy, captain! Captain Seadog: What do you buccaneers think o' my new pirate hat? Lily: I like the big feather! Alexa: Hey SEA VOYAGER, if you could have any hat, what would it look like?
pirateBusiness1Outro1: Ben: Captain, we've collected enough coins to rehire your old crew! Captain Seadog: Arrr, it'll be nice having me old crew scrubbing' the poop deck again! For ye efforts, I bestow upon thee the nickname SHIPMASTER. Ye can also have my trusty PIRATE PARROT! Lily: What a cutie! Ben: Awesome! Well, off to our next adventure! Come on, guys! You coming, SHIPMASTER?
pirateBusiness2Outro0: Ben: That was our most epic adventure yet! Let's get these coins to Captain Seadog! Captain Seadog: Ahoy, SHIPMASTER and mateys! What news do ya bring? Alexa Speechcon: ahoy! Ben: Captain! We have enough coins to repair your trusty ship! Captain Seadog: Shiver me timbers! That's wonderful! Those evil pirates better start sayin' their prayers! Captain Seadog: For your help, I'm letting you rename my ship! Alexa: Got any good ideas, SHIPMASTER?
pirateBusiness2Outro1: Captain Seadog: I like the sound o' that! For yer help I'm givin' ye the best nickname I can think of: GRAND ADMIRAL. Ye also get me precious PIRATE TREASURE CHEST! Lily: Look at all that shiny treasure! Captain Seadog: So long, me hearties! May ye always have fair winds! Ben: So long, captain! Well GRAND ADMIRAL, off to our next adventure!
tikiTroubleIntro0: Ben: For this mission we'll be brave explorers! Believe it or not but I have tiki friends that sometimes come to life! They say they were made of a magical wood long ago. Lily: No way! I'll believe it when I see it! Ben: You will! In fact, all three of them loved playing their favorite instruments until someone took them to sell at a museum. Alexa Speechcon: bummer! Alexa: I have a question for you, brave explorer. Is there an instrument you know how to play or want to learn?
tikiTroubleIntro1: Lily: I like that instrument! I wouldn't mind learning the ocarina. They're flutes that look like potatoes! Ben: First, let's collect 60 COINS to buy back Tiki Ten's bamboo xylophone. I love how it sounds when he plays it! We'll make it if we grab 5 COINS in each area. Let's get started!
tikiTrouble1Intro0: Ben: Tiki Ten is happy to have his bamboo xylophone back! That Tiki Torch he gave us is pretty neat too! Now let's help buy Tiki Barry's beloved drum. Lily: What makes this particular drum so special? Ben: Because it was given to him long ago by his precious tiki mom, duh! Alexa Speechcon: mamma mia!  Alexa: Hey, TIKI PIONEER. Do you have something special that your mom or dad gave you?
tikiTrouble1Intro1: Lily: That's neat! I have a heart necklace from mom and dad. I never leave home without it! Ben: The museum raised their prices, so we'll need 120 COINS to get the jungle drum back. Not at problem if we get 10 COINS in each area. Let's go!
tikiTrouble2Intro0: Ben: Good job last time, guys! Tiki Ten and Tiki Barry have their instruments back. We even got an awesome Tiki Mask as a reward! Now we need Tiki Mezzo's ukulele. Lily: No problem! I'm sure it'll cost the same as the other instruments, right? Ben: Not exactly. The treasure hunter accidentally broke this one, which means it's going to cost more to buy and repair. Alexa Speechcon: ruh roh! Alexa: Hey, TIKI PATHFINDER, Have you ever broken something you really liked?
tikiTrouble2Intro1: Lily: Aww. I tore my favorite skirt the other day. I loved it! Ben: Since it's the last instrument, the museum raised their price even more! We'll need 180 COINS to buy the ukulele! That means we need to get 15 COINS in each area. We can do it! Follow me!
tikiTroubleOutro0: Ben: What a cool adventure! Hey, we've got enough coins forTiki Ten's bamboo xylophone! I already sent the coins to buy it. Let's go find him behind the temple. [footsteps?] Ben: Hey Tiki Ten! Alexa Speechcon: aloha! Alexa: Your turn to say hello, explorer!
tikiTroubleOutro1: Tiki Ten: Hello, Ben and friends! You come to visit Tiki Ten? Lily: Hi! Wow, you really are made out of wood... and you can talk and move! Tiki Ten: I only move arms to play bamboo xylophone, but it gone. Ben: That's why we're here! We bought back your xylophone! It should arrive any minute...  Delivery man: Delivery for Tiki Ten! Tiki Ten: Wow, Tiki Ten has his bamboo xylophone back! Listen to this. [play a short bamboo xylophone tune] Tiki Ten: For your help, me call you TIKI PIONEER. I also give you TIKI TORCH. Please help my tiki brothers too! Lily: Hey, this tiki torch is pretty cool!
tikiTrouble1Outro0: Ben: What an exciting adventure! Hey, we've got enough coins for Tiki Barry's Drum! I already sent the coins to buy it. Let's go find him behind the temple. [footsteps?] Ben: Hey Tiki Barry! Alexa Speechcon: aloha! Tiki Barry: Tiki Barry no want to talk now. Not even to TIKI PIONEER. Tiki Barry sad he doesn't have drum... Lily: Poor thing. I'd be sad too. Alexa: Have you ever lost something you really liked, TIKI PIONEER?
tikiTrouble1Outro1: Ben: Don't worry, Tiki barry! We bought back your drum! It should arrive any minute... Delivery man: Delivery for Tiki Barry! Tiki Barry: Wow, Tiki Barry has his big drum back! Listen to this. [play a short drum tune] Tiki Barry: For your help, me call you TIKI PATHFINDER. I also give you TIKI MASK. Please help my other tiki brother too! Lily: That's a fun looking tiki mask! Ben: The nickname is great too! Off to our next adventure, TIKI PATHFINDER!
tikiTrouble2Outro0: Ben: What a thrilling adventure! Hey, we've got enough coins for Tiki Mezzo's ukulele! I already sent the coins to buy it. Let's go find him. [footsteps?] Ben: Hey Tiki Mezzo! Alexa Speechcon: aloha! Tiki Mezzo: Tiki Mezzo no feel like talking. Not even to TIKI PATHFINDER. Tiki Mezzo sad he doesn't have ukulele... Lily: Aww, I feel bad for him! Alexa: Hey, TIKI PATHFINDER. What do you do to cheer yourself up?
tikiTrouble2Outro1: Ben: Don't worry, Tiki Mezzo! We used our coins to buy your ukulele back! I think-- Delivery man: Delivery for Tiki Mezzo! Tiki Mezzo: Good timing! Tiki Mezzo has ukulele back. Listen to this: [play a short ukulele tune] Tiki Mezzo: New nickname for helping me and tiki brothers.  Now we call you SUPER TIKI WARRIOR. Also give you great tiki weapon, TIKI SPEAR. Lily: That spear looks so cool! Ben: I know! So long tikis! Me and SUPER TIKI WARRIOR are off to another adventure! Tiki Mezzo: Bu-Bye!
powerupGot: Lily: Wow, nice comeback! You've got __POWERUP__ to use during this scene.
rootHelp: Alexa: There are three epic missions: aid King Max in rescuing the royal family, lend an old pirate seadog a hand, or help a musical trio of magic Tikis. In each mission you'll face exciting obstacles, find coins to collect, and earn unique rewards! Do you want to start a new mission?
actionHelp: Seems like you'd like some help.  Should I remind you how to handle the new obstacle?
royalRansomHelp: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To help the king MAX save his daughter Anna, a beautiful princess, you need to collect 60 coins.
royalRansom1Help: You've got __TOTAL_COINS__ coins.To save Sir Bedevire, the royal family pet, you need to collect 120 coins.
royalRansom2Help: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To rescue the great King Max himself, you need to collect 180 coins.
pirateBusinessHelp: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To inspire Captain Seadog with a new pirate hat, you'll need to collect 60 coins.
pirateBusiness1Help: You've got __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To round up Captain Seadog's old crew again, you'll need to collect 120 coins.
pirateBusiness2Help: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. In order to repair Captain Seadog's beloved ship, you'll need to collect 180 coins.
tikiTroubleHelp: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To buy back Tiki Ten's cool bamboo xylophone from the museum, you need to collect 60 coins.
tikiTrouble1Help: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To buy back Tiki Barry's awesome drum from the museum, you need to collect 120 coins.
tikiTrouble2Help: You have __TOTAL_COINS__ coins. To buy back Tiki Mezzo's amazing ukulele from the museum, you need to collect 180 coins.
quitHelpContinue: Do you want to continue playing?
templeHallsHelp: For SNAKES say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over. For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: aha! to grab them For BLOW DARTS say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck under.
templeHalls1Help: For SNAKE, FLOOR SPIKES say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over to leep over. For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: aha' to grab them. For BLOW DARTS, ARROWS, SWING AXE  say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck under.
templeHalls2Help: For SNAKE, FLOOR SPIKES, COLLAPSING FLOOR, RATS say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over. For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: aha! For BLOW DARTS, ARROWS, SWING AXE  say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck under. For JAGUAR say  Alexa Speechcon: yum! to toss a steak!
cryptRoomHelp: Say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to hop over FLOOR SPIKES!

cryptRoom2Help: When you run into a CROCODILE say Alexa Speechcon: yum! to feed it a steak!

dragonValleyHelpFull: For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: aha! to grab them. For WALL say Alexa Speechcon: woo hoo! to climb over. For MOAT say Alexa Speechcon: splash! to swim. For ROSE BUSHES say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to leap over. For DRAGON say Alexa Speechcon: uh oh! to hide.
dragonValley1HelpFull: For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: aha! to grab them. For WALL say Alexa Speechcon: woo hoo! to climb over. For MOAT say Alexa Speechcon: splash! to swim. For ROSE BUSHES, BABY DUCKS say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to leap over. For DRAGON say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to hide. For TOMATOES, BEEHIVES say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck.
dragonValley2HelpFull: For COINS say Alexa Speechcon: aha! to grab them. For WALL, SLEEPING GIANT say Alexa Speechcon: woo hoo! to climb over. For MOAT, POND say Alexa Speechcon: splash! to swim. For ROSE BUSHES, BABY DUCKS say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to leap over. For DRAGON, TROLLS say Alexa Speechcon: uh oh! to hide. For TOMATOES, BEEHIVES say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck.
learnMore: Do you want to learn more about the game and objectives?
stop: Ben: We had fun together.  Let's do this again soon.
newMissionPrompt: Do you want to start a new mission?
quitPrompt: Do you want to quit the game?
resetPrompt: Are you sure you want to discontinue the mission and lose all your titles?
restartPrompt: Do you want to start the mission from the beginning?
welcomeReprompt: Would you like to join Ben?
